verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who were in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%>

to whom the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

It came also in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H8552>end<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the carrying <S%H1540>away<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1540>captive<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H2962>"Before<s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> you in the <S%H990>belly,<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3318>you.<s%> Before you came forth out of the <S%H7358>womb,<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H5414>you.<s%> I have appointed you a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>"
Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Ah,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H3045>Behold,<s%> I don't know how to <S%H1696>speak;<s%> for I am a <S%H5288>child.<s%>"

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> "Don't say, <S%H5288><s%> 'I am a child;' for to whoever I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3212>you,<s%> you shall go, and whatever I shall <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H1696>you,<s%> you shall speak.
<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid because of <S%H6440>them;<s%> for I am with you to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5414>me,<s%> "Behold, I have put my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6485>set<s%> you over the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and over the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> and to break <S%H5422>down<s%> and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> and to <S%H2040>overthrow,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> and to <S%H5193>plant.<s%>"

Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H3414>"300,<s%> what do you <S%H7200>see?<s%>" I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4731>branch<s%> of an almond <S%H8247>tree.<s%>"
Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> "You have seen <S%H3190>well;<s%> for I <S%H8245>watch<s%> over my <S%H1697>word<s%> to perform <S%H6213>it.<s%>"

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to me the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What do you <S%H7200>see?<s%>" I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5301>boiling<s%> <S%H5518>caldron;<s%> and it is <S%H6440>tipping<s%> away <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>"
Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6828>me,<s%> "Out of the north <S%H7451>evil<s%> will break <S%H6605>out<s%> on all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H7121>For,<s%> behold, I will call all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> "and they shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and they shall <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and against all its <S%H2346>walls<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

I will <S%H1696>utter<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> against them <S%H5921>touching<s%> all their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> in that they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H6999>me,<s%> and have burned incense to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

"You therefore <S%H247>put<s%> your belt on your <S%H4975>waist,<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H2865>you.<s%> Don't be dismayed at <S%H6440>them,<s%> lest I <S%H2865>dismay<s%> you before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

<S%H589>For,<s%> behold, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2346>walls,<s%> against the whole <S%H776>land,<s%> against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> against its <S%H8269>princes,<s%> against its <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
They will <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3201>you;<s%> but they will not prevail against <S%H5002>you;<s%> for I am with you," says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "to deliver <S%H5337>you.<s%>"
